Posted By: Paolino (1/27/2012 2:28:27 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card always have been extremely strong. It stops many combos and mana acceleration, and I've exploited comes into play effects of [Scrivener](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scrivener) to reclaim [counterspell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=counterspell) myself. It is very cruel as the win condition of that deck involves a discard engine, kill enemy creatures by sending them back to their hand and force them to discard, while cleaning the opponent's field with [Recoil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Recoil), [Glowing Anemone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glowing Anemone) and [Rishadan Cutpurse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rishadan Cutpurse). Enemy permanents are taken down one by one while I'm protected by a counterspell at hand. Opponent only lose when they have no permanents and no cards in hand, with my [Saprazzan Outrigger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Saprazzan Outrigger) as finisher.
posts.html:
This card always have been extremely strong. It stops many combos and mana acceleration, and I've exploited comes into play effects of Scrivener to reclaim counterspell myself. It is very cruel as the win condition of that deck involves a discard engine, kill enemy creatures by sending them back to their hand and force them to discard, while cleaning the opponent's field with Recoil, Glowing Anemone and Rishadan Cutpurse. Enemy permanents are taken down one by one while I'm protected by a counterspell at hand. Opponent only lose when they have no permanents and no cards in hand, with my Saprazzan Outrigger as finisher.

posts.post_content:
Man, for a brief period this guy was showing up in Top 8 Legacy decks, because [Survival of the Fittest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Survival of the Fittest) needed a way to re-play a couple [Basking Rootwalla](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basking Rootwalla)s to trigger [Vengevine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vengevine).  
  
It's always funny when a junk card from ages ago suddenly shows up in top-tier tournament decklists. :)
